attributes.action: save staunton community sports college (leigh park)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
staunton school is a very much loved school by the students, teachers,and the surrounding community. it has been going 40yrs through thick and thin, the school is in one of the most deprived areas of britain (goverment speak not mine). the current headteacher has done a remarkable job with the help of his staff in turning this school around and investing in new equiptment refurbished buildings.
it is part of a federation of schools who's pupils share one anothers facilities. they dont want the school to close and neither do the people of leigh park, the pupils,staff,and the governors. so mr brown i dare you if you will to come and visit this wonderul school, before you rip the heart out of a carring community

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
